abstract: Black Lives Matter UK activists stage protests across Britain in response to movement's call for nationwide demonstration against racial injustice.
lead_paragraph: Members of the emerging movement in the country demonstrated in London, Birmingham, Nottingham and other cities, responding to calls for a nationwide protest against racial injustice.
snippet: Members of the emerging movement in the country demonstrated in London, Birmingham, Nottingham and other cities, responding to calls for a nationwide protest against racial injustice....

headline.main: Black Lives Matter Activists Stage Protests Across Britain
headline.print_headline: Black Lives Matter Activists Protest Across Britain
